description:
Nintendo Video brings you short 2D and 3D videos from the worlds of comedy, animation, music, and Hollywood. It’s unique, one-of-a-kind entertainment, handpicked especially for Nintendo 3DS.

You can find Nintendo Video on the Main Menu of Nintendo eShop, or just enter a search for your favorite shows, like Dinosaur Office, Meat or Die, and Shaun the Sheep. They’re all there, along with many others. More videos will be added to the line-up occasionally, so check back often.

Go ahead – watch what you like, anytime you like!
name: Nintendo Video
